attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having bailed Northern Rock out of the hole they where in, the goverment are in prime postion to offer a National mortgage. Rather than feeding tax payers monies into the banking system as a whole they should offer a national mortgage at an acceptable rate of intrest to rekindle the mortgage market. Remember it's not that banks don't have the money it's that they have stopped lending to one another and prefer to hold the Goverment and the tax payer to ransom!
